help.text: The input is a text file with comma separated values, a .csv file. The supported formats are "decimal . and separator ," or "decimal , and separator ;". Data should be stored in three columns in CSV, with the following format: "row_idx_value,column_idx_value,data_value". Row and column index value vectors can be floating point decimal values Example for 2x3 matrix: r1, c1, v11 r1, c2, v12 r1, c3, v13 r2, c1, v21 r2, c2, v22 r2, c3, v23 The index value vectors has to be strictly increasing, if this is not the case, it will be automatically sorted. Duplicate values in the input data vectors are not allowed. One blank (empty) line must be present at the end of the data file.
